A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointed. I’ve been a die hard Star Wars fan since it was just Star Wars. No “New Hope” in sight. I was sceptical about the final trilogy in Lucas’ epic space drama. Then I found out J J Abrams was at the helm writing and directing and episode 7 did not disappoint me in any way. Then for 8 he moved to E. P. and I got worried. Turns out rightly so. The last half of Act 3 was the best part of the film by a long long way. The prospect of Episode IX now has me thinking of Ep I. That’s not good. Hopefully JJ Abrams will wrest the reins once more but I’m not holding my breath. I give 3 stars more for posterity and the memory of a Princess...
